name: Powerlifting
description: This are specifically purpose built facilities for this type of athletic pursuit. You’ll see a lot of weightlifting platforms and racks in this type of gym, and not a lot of cardio or weight machines.

name: Boutique Gym
description: Boutique wellness studios are aesthetically beautiful in nature, friendly and social environments and they’re more of a community than a just a gym.Boutique gyms offer dedicated group fitness classes, in particular – yoga, pilates and tone style.

name: Big Box Gyms
description: The first type of gym out there are big box gyms. I once heard a gym owner describe box box gyms to me bluntly (and somewhat humorously too.‘You’re pretty much paying for a big room full of fitness equipment. Unless you pay extra, you don’t get a lot of support’.
